resources.string: This App was developed to help estimate the solar system requirements for a small apartment or an office. It is very simple and easy to use.
To get started with Solar Calculator, follow the following instructions:
1. To add appliances click on the floating \"+\" button. This will open a page where one can input the name of the appliance and the power rating, hours of use and quantity.

2. Enter the name of the appliance in the provided text field or pick from the list of appliances given. Other appliances include ceiling fan, radio, blender, laptop, iron, standing fan, microwave, refrigerator, deep freezer, vacuum cleaner etc.

3. Enter the Power Rating of the appliance. The power rating is a quantity that describes the total electrical power required for normal operation of an electric appliance. This is listed as part of the name plate data attached to the appliance. The power rating is expressed in either Watts(W) or Kilowatts(KW).
4. Enter the number of hours the appliance will be used and the quantity
5. Click the \"save appliance\" button to save the details entered in the text fields.
6. Save as many appliances as required and then click the "calculate" button to display the Total Load and Total Demand required.
7. Enter the solar panel and battery details.
8. Click on "generate result" to show the final result.
